Copywriter
#—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #senior #lead #200k
Company: Mad Devs
Salary: –æ—Ç 1 500 –¥–æ 2 000$
What will need to do:
- Writing of articles from receiving the technical specifications to final approval of the author (expert) or SEO specialist
- Writing of texts for landings according to the design - from the interview/technical specification to the author's (expert's) approvement of landings
- Writing of e-books from receiving TOR or interview with expert to final approvement by the author (expert) or SEO specialist
- Writing case studies and portfolios on projects
- Proofreading and ability to compose/work with tone of voice
- Proofreading, editing, and recommending improvements to another copywriter's content
Our expectations:
- Are experienced writer, editor, and proofreader with attention to detail
- You have higher education in marketing, PR and communications, journalism, linguistics or philology
- 5 or more years of experience as a copywriter/marketer in B2B. B2C experience will be a plus
- You have subject matter expertise (Technology and Development), and experience working with/for technology companies
- Understand tone of voice and the ability to pitch content with the right context
- Got the ability to present cases or expert opinions organically
- Know how to express complex ideas in interesting and understandable content
- Fluent in English (spoken and written). A certi—áicate like IELTS or TOEFL would be a plus Understand digital marketing and landing page optimization (SEO) best practices.
- Have a portfolio with successful marketing campaigns that demonstrate versatility in content creation and the ability to work with a variety of tone-of-voice and communication strategies
- Proficiency with a wide range of text tools, including AI-tooling
- Skill in crafting prompts for AI tools
- Strong research and fact-checking skills to ensure accuracy and originality
- Website content management: understanding the strategy for landings, articles, ibooks and the ability to link them together
- Know how to work with metrics and how to improve them
Contact: https://t.me/recruiter_maddevs

Marketing Manager
#—É–¥–∞–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #senior #300k
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: weway
–ó–ü: –æ—Ç 3 500$
About Us:
WeWay is at the forefront of the Web3 revolution, building innovative solutions that empower individuals and businesses to harness the full potential of decentralized technologies. With a strong commitment to privacy, security, and user empowerment, we are dedicated to creating tools and platforms that facilitate seamless interactions in the decentralized digital landscape.
Key Responsibilities:
‚Äî Execute and enhance Web3 marketing campaigns to drive brand awareness, user acquisition, and engagement.
‚Äî Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product management, design, and business development, to ensure alignment of marketing initiatives with business objectives and product roadmap.
‚Äî Lead the creation of compelling marketing collateral, including website content, blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, presentations, and social media content, to effectively communicate our value proposition and key messages to our target audience.
‚Äî Analyze and interpret marketing data and metrics to measure the effectiveness of campaigns, identify areas for improvement, and optimize marketing performance.
‚Äî Communicate with key stakeholders and industry influencers to amplify our brand presence and thought leadership in the Web3 community.
‚Äî Stay informed about emerging trends and best practices in crypto marketing, blockchain/crypto industry, and Web3 technologies, leveraging insights to inform marketing strategy and innovation.
Job Requirements:
‚Äî Proven track record of successful marketing in the crypto industry.
‚Äî Strong interest in exploring DeFi space.
‚Äî Stress-resistant and flexible mindset.
‚Äî Understanding of crypto marketing principles, tools, and tactics, including content marketing, email marketing, social media marketing, and analytics.
‚Äî Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling messaging and storytelling that resonates with our audience.
‚Äî Strategic thinker with a data-driven approach to decision-making and problem-solving.
‚Äî Creative thinker with a passion for innovation and exploring new marketing opportunities in the Web3 space.
‚Äî Experience with marketing automation platforms, CRM systems, and analytics tools.
‚Äî Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and mentor a high-performing marketing team.
We Offer:
‚Äî Competitive salary (from $3500) and a full-time job.
‚Äî Mode of work -  remotely, considering business trips to Dubai.
‚Äî Flexible working hours and a remote-friendly environment.
‚Äî Opportunities for professional development and growth.
‚Äî An inclusive and collaborative team culture.
‚Äî A chance to be part of the revolutionary DeFi and Web3 space.
Contact: https://t.me/joozar
